title: Molasses Cookies
directions: Combine the butter and sugar in a large bowl.
Cream for one minute, or until fluffy.
Add in the egg and beat until smooth.
Next add in the molasses and mix until combined.
Place the flour, baking soda, cinnamon, ginger, cloves and salt into a sifter or whisk together, then add to the butter mixture.
Mix just until combined. Be careful not to over mix.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and set aside.
Using a medium cookie scoop (about 1.5 tsp), roll the dough into a ball. Place on the baking sheet, about 2 inches apart.
Bake 8-10 minutes and let cool on the pan 5 minutes before moving to a cooling rack.
ingredients: ¼ cup granulated sugar (for rolling the cookies)
1 to 2 cup white chocolate melting wafers (for dipping the cookies)
